title: The Flay List
overview: The Flay List follows culinary icon Bobby Flay and his daughter Sophie as they hit the streets in search of the greatest local dishes around. Over the course of the series, Bobby visits the culinary spots he has frequented for years in his beloved hometown of New York City, while Sophie introduces her dad to her latest discoveries. Whether it's a visit to Joe's Pizza in Greenwich Village for a classic New York slice or a ferry ride for some delicious lobster rolls at Red Hook Lobster Pound, Bobby and Sophie visit the old school and new alike, taking viewers on a culinary experience like no other.
